{
  double Xcm[3];
  double ed[3], edsq = 0.0;
  int i;

  calcCMPosition(Q, X, Xcm);

  OneBodyOperator op_ob_d = {dim: 3, opt: 1, par: Xcm, me: ob_edipole};

  calcSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, &op_ob_d, ed);

  for (i=0; i<3; i++)
    edsq += SQR(ed[i]);

  *ed2 = sqrt(edsq);

void calcgradConstraintED2 ( const SlaterDet *  Q,
const SlaterDetAux *  X,
const gradSlaterDetAux *  dX,
gradSlaterDet *  ded2 
)

Definition at line 118 of file ConstraintDipole.c.

References calcCMPosition(), calcgradCMSlaterDetOBME(), calcgradSlaterDetOBME(), calcSlaterDetOBME(), dipolepara::d, dim, par, SQR, gradSlaterDet::val, and dipolepara::Xcm.

{
  double Xcm[3];
  double ed[3], edsq = 0.0;
  int i;
  dipolepara ed2par;

  calcCMPosition(Q, X, Xcm);

  OneBodyOperator op_ob_d = {dim: 3, opt: 1, par: Xcm, me: ob_edipole};

  calcSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, &op_ob_d, ed);

  for (i=0; i<3; i++)
    edsq += SQR(ed[i]);
  
  for (i=0; i<3; i++)
    ed2par.Xcm[i] = Xcm[i];

  for (i=0; i<3; i++)
    ed2par.d[i] = ed[i]/sqrt(edsq);

  gradOneBodyOperator gop_ob_d2 = {opt: 1, par: &ed2par, me: gob_edipole};

  calcgradSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, dX, &gop_ob_d2, ded2);

  OneBodyOperator gcmop_ob_d2 = {dim: 6, opt: 1, par: &ed2par, me: gcmob_edipole};

  calcgradCMSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, dX, &gcmop_ob_d2, ded2);
  ded2->val = sqrt(edsq);
}
